duck: Ability grouping - Ability grouping is the educational practice of grouping students by academic potential or past achievement.
"Ability" (Fringe), an episode of the television series Fringe
Skill - A skill is the learned capacity to carry out pre-determined results often with the minimum outlay of time, energy, or both.
ABILITY Magazine - ABILITY Magazine was founded by Chet Cooper in 1990, launched as the first newsstand magazine focused on issues of health and disability.
Intelligence - Intelligence has been defined in different ways, including the abilities for abstract thought, understanding, communication, reasoning, learning, planning, and problem solving.
Ability (UK magazine) - Ability is the publication targeting people who have difficulties using information technology.
ability definition: the quality or state of being able.
Aptitude - An aptitude is an innate component of a competency to do a certain kind of work at a certain level.
Ability Plus Software, makers of the office suite Ability Office

wiki.text:
'Ability' may be:
* Aptitude
* Intelligence
* Skill

'Ability' may also refer to:

* Ability score, in role-playing games
* Ability Plus Software, makers of the office suite Ability Office
* Ability grouping
* ABILITY Magazine
* Ability (UK magazine)
* "Ability" (''Fringe''), an episode of the television series Fringe
